text: Jean-Eudes Lauristin (born 10 March 1994) is a French Guianaan footballer who currently plays for Étoile Matoury in the French Guiana Honor Division and the French Guiana national team. == International career == Lauristin made his national team debut for French Guiana on 6 June 2018 in a 0–3 loss against Martinque. Lauristin scored his first goal and first competitive goal on 7 September 2018, scoring the opening goal in a 5–0 win against Anguilla, as part of 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualifying. === International goals === :Scores and results list French Guiana's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !!
